CustomField.formula:
IF ( RecordType.Name = "Short Summary of Income", ( Savings_Pension_Insurance_Number__c + Personal_Expenses_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Statutory_Deductions_Numbers__c + Rent_Strata_Maintenance__c) ,
IF ( RecordType.Name = "Full Details Of Income/Living Expenses", (Property_Tax_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Property_Insurance_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Property_Maintenance_Monthly_Prior_loan__c + Personal_Expenses_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Food_Cost_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Child_Care_Costs_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + School_Costs_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Health_Costs_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Other_Personal_Family_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Electricity_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Water_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Cell_Phone_Landline_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Internet_Cable_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Cooking_Gas_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + House_Keeping_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Other_Utilities_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Fares_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Petrol_Fuel_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Toll_Fees_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Motor_V_Insurance_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Motor_Vehicle_Reg_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Motor_Vehicle_Fitness_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c + Motor_V_Maintenance_Monthly_Before_Loan__c + Other_Transport_Costs_Monthly_Prior_Loan__c ),0 ))
CustomField.label: Total Outflows
